text:
Rentman (https://www.rentman.io) | Utrecht, The Netherlands | Backend engineer | Onsite

At Rentman we build the tools that help event suppliers run their business. Last year around 700.000 events where planned with our tool and we're looking for people who help us scale our tech.

We're a small team (around 35 people, 10 tech) where we value a healthy work/life balance.

Our stack is Angular,PHP,MySQL,Socket.io,Ionic,Docker,AWS. For this position you'll mainly develop in PHP.

You will have the opportunity to contribute to all areas of our code base.

Details: https://rentman.io/en/jobs/backend-developer-11-2018

Apply by email: work@rentman.io
